data.title: kirtan
data.text:
In Which Tune To Sing This Shabad?

This Shabad presents a peculiar instruction in the beginning, Most of the Shabads are either instructed to be sung in 'Raags'(ਰਾਗ) , 'Ghar-u(ਘਰੁ), or in some specific 'Dhun'(ਧੁਨ)(like ਕਾਨੜੇ ਕੀ ਵਾਰ ਮਹਲਾ ੪ ਮੂਸੇ ਕੀ ਵਾਰ ਕੀ ਧੁਨੀ, ਵਾਰ ਮਾਝ ਕੀ ਤਥਾ ਸਲੋਕ ਮਹਲਾ ੧. ਮਲਕ ਮੁਰੀਦ ਤਥਾ ਚੰਦ੍ਰਹੜਾ ਸੋਹੀਆ ਕੀ ਧੁਨੀ...

Kirtan

Sat Sri Akaal, Bhul Chuk Maaf, it's not propagation of false hood or false religion, One may reject or delete thoughts if one finds them unaccepted. Focus is on topic of "Kirtan" True Nature's effort to physical formation. Human's are treated as effort from nature's formation...

Amrit Kirtan In Hindi Pdf Book

Hello All, japposatnamwaheguru: I m learning kirtan and i amritvale sing shabads in gurudwara. I need a amrit kirtan in pdf so that i can view on my mobile or tablet if i forget any line. I really feel bad when i forget any line it actually disturbs the flow of my singing. I searched but all are...

Dancing To Kirtan?

Hi, I recently started thinking about how most sanatan religions let people dance to bhajans etc.. but do you think it'd be banned in Sikhism? Not any slutty dancing, but dancing for pure love and happiness.

Kirtan Kirtan Or Simran With Bass :)

WJJK WJKF!! Im really into the deep bass of the Tabla in Kirtn and love bass in general. Does anyone have and good Simran, or shabad Kirtan videos or audios that have really deep bass!??!? I love all Kirtan styles so any clip would be good, just NO DHARMIC please !! :) haha, because i...

Ik Oankaar Parvaar And Guru Granth Sahib Academy: Bandi Chor Diwas Kirtan Diwan

A special kirtan diwan will be held at the academy on wednesday October 26th from 7 pm to 9 pm. Singh Sahib Prof. Darshan Singh ji will be doing kirtan as well as the youth kirtani jathas' of GGSA and Bhai Lakhbir Singh ji will also do Gurmat Vichaar. Guru ka Langar will be served and...

Last Of The Rababis

The rababi tradition within Sikhism is associated with the first rababi, Bhai Mardana, a Muslim musician who had been a virtual lifelong companion of Guru Nanak throughout his epic travels. Remarkably, the tradition actually survived within the Golden Temple until relatively recently, and...

Nagar Kirtans. Some Thoughts From The Sidelines

After several years away, I was recently a spectator at the local annual Vaisakhi nagar kirtan. I was the taxi service to the 1st stop so it was a great opportunity to stand outside and observe. I used to think nagar kirtans were a waste and we should pursue other projects such as cleaning up...

[ੴ] December 31st - Evening Kirtan GGS Academy

Waheguru jika Khalsa Waheguru jiki Fateh. As it has been a routine for Sikh Parwaars going to Gurdwara Sahib on the evening of Dec 31st of every year, this year also there will be Kirtan Samagam at Guru Granth Sahib Academy on Friday, Dec 31st from 8:00pm onwards. Please come, join and...

India Jor Mela Ends With Colourful Nagar Kirtan

Jor Mela ends with colourful nagar kirtan An impressive Nagar Kirtan wound its way through the streets of Fatehgarh Sahib on the final day of the three-day ‘Shahidi Jor Mele’ to commemorate the martyrdom of Baba Zorawar Singh and Baba Fateh Singh, younger sons of the 10th Sikh Guru, Gobind...
